index.html.title: DotNetHelper-IO | DotNetHelper-IO
index.html.keywords: DotNetHelper-IO This is a simple easy to use library for handling files,zips, & folders How to use ... var file = new FileObject("filepath"); var folder = new FolderObject("folderpath"); var zipFile = new ZipFileObject("zipfilepath"); ... Targeted .NET Frameworks NET452 NETSTANDARD2.0
